shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the state of the local user's audio mixing file changes.

section.p: This callback occurs when the playback state of the music file changes, and reports the current state and error code.

If the local music file does not exist, or if the SDK does not support the file format, or if the SDK cannot access the URL of the online music file, the SDK returns the warning code WARN_AUDIO_MIXING_OPEN_ERROR (701).

plentry.pd: The playback state of the music file. See .
